reviewText: I grew up watching veggie tales and now I'm in college and rediscovering them. These are some of my favorite veggie tales movies and the lessons always hit home (even at my age). What I love most is these movies aren't preachy, they simply tell the story to teach a lesson, if you have kids or grandkids I'd strongly recommend them. These movies are fun for the whole family.
summary: Can't go wrong with Veggie Tales
Title: N/A

reviewText: I own several veggietales movies and find them to be of consistently high quality. The humor can be enjoyed not only by children but by many teens and adults also. These movies provide an excellent opportunity for family entertainment which also helps instill  Biblical principles
